mapper.insert: insert into seer_msg (msg_id, msg_user_from_id, msg_user_accept_id, msg_time, msg_content) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgUserFromId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgUserAcceptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select msg_id, msg_user_from_id, msg_user_accept_id, msg_time, msg_content from seer_msg
